meanings.sent1: My grandmas always bake delicious cookies for me.
meanings.sent2: I visited my grandmas over the weekend and had a great time.
meanings.sent3: When my grandmas start dancing, everyone laughs and joins in.
meanings.sent4: The grandmas of the neighborhood are like the wise queens of the street.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh pies from my grandmas' kitchen is unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: There are three grandmas in our family, each with a unique personality.
meanings.sent2: My grandmas always tell the best stories from their youth.
meanings.sent3: The grandmas at the park formed a knitting club and meet every week.
meanings.sent4: The grandmas in the retirement home are a tight-knit group.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the grandmas echoed through the family reunion.
